actions.body:
Hi there,

Thank you for completing your mental health check-in. Based on your responses, we want to share these resources that might be helpful:

- Crisis Text Line: Text HOME to 741741
- National Suicide Prevention Lifeline: 988
- Therapist directories: PsychologyToday.com

You're not alone.

The InnerSpace Team
